info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:27PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Siskiyou County through 400 PM PDT... At 327 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunsmuir, or 7 miles south of Mount Shasta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Shasta, Dunsmuir, Pilgrim Creek Snow Park, Fowlers Camp Campground And McCloud Falls, Mount Shasta Ski Park Highway and McCloud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
